## 对象内嵌套对象

> https://github.com/zircote/swagger-php/blob/master/Examples/example-object/example-object.php

#### 对象内嵌套对象

```
     * @OA\Post(
     *     path="/product/use-voucher/sent-captcha",
     *     tags={"Pay.Product"},
     *     summary="sent captcha to use voucher",
     *     @OA\RequestBody(
     *          required=true,
     *          @OA\MediaType(
     *              mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
     *              @OA\Schema(
     *                  type="object",
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="uid",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/uid",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="access_token",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/access_token",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="captcha_length",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/captcha_length",
     *                  ),
     *              ),
     *          ),
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *          response=400,
     *          description="error",
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *          response=200,
     *          description="success",
     *          @OA\JsonContent(
     *              type="object",
     *              @OA\Property(
     *                  property="code",
     *                  ref="#/components/schemas/code",
     *              ),
     *              @OA\Property(
     *                  property="msg",
     *                  ref="#/components/schemas/msg",
     *              ),
     *              @OA\Property(
     *                  property="data",
     *                  type="object",
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="captcha",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/captcha",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="name",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/name",
     *                  ),
     *              ),
     *          ),
     *     ),
     * )
```

数组

```
     * @OA\Post(
     *     path="/voucher/vouchers",
     *     tags={"Pay.Voucher"},
     *     summary="get avaliable voucher list",
     *     @OA\RequestBody(
     *          required=true,
     *          @OA\MediaType(
     *              mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
     *              @OA\Schema(
     *                  type="object",
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="lid",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/lid",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="gid",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/gid",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="platform",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/platform",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="uid",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/uid",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="sub_uid",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/sub_uid",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="equipment_id",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/equipment_id",
     *                  ),
     *              ),
     *          ),
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *          response=400,
     *          description="error",
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *          response=200,
     *          description="error",
     *          @OA\JsonContent(
     *              type="array",
     *              @OA\Items(
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="id",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/voucher_id",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="money",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/voucher_money",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="type",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/voucher_type",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="begin_at",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/begin_at",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="end_at",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/end_at",
     *                  ),
     *              ),
     *          ),
     *     ),
     * )
```

对象内嵌套数组

```
     * @OA\Post(
     *     path="/product/use-voucher/sent-captcha",
     *     tags={"Pay.Product"},
     *     summary="sent captcha to use voucher",
     *     @OA\RequestBody(
     *          required=true,
     *          @OA\MediaType(
     *              mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded",
     *              @OA\Schema(
     *                  type="object",
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="uid",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/uid",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="access_token",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/access_token",
     *                  ),
     *                  @OA\Property(
     *                      property="captcha_length",
     *                      ref="#/components/schemas/captcha_length",
     *                  ),
     *              ),
     *          ),
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *          response=400,
     *          description="error",
     *     ),
     *     @OA\Response(
     *          response=200,
     *          description="success",
     *          @OA\JsonContent(
     *              type="object",
     *              @OA\Property(
     *                  property="code",
     *                  ref="#/components/schemas/code",
     *              ),
     *              @OA\Property(
     *                  property="msg",
     *                  ref="#/components/schemas/msg",
     *              ),
     *              @OA\Property(
     *                  property="data",
     *                  type="array",
     *                  @OA\Items(
     *                      @OA\Property(
     *                          property="id",
     *                          ref="#/components/schemas/voucher_id",
     *                      ),
     *                      @OA\Property(
     *                          property="money",
     *                          ref="#/components/schemas/voucher_money",
     *                      ),
     *                      @OA\Property(
     *                          property="type",
     *                          ref="#/components/schemas/voucher_type",
     *                      ),
     *                      @OA\Property(
     *                          property="begin_at",
     *                          ref="#/components/schemas/begin_at",
     *                      ),
     *                      @OA\Property(
     *                          property="end_at",
     *                          ref="#/components/schemas/end_at",
     *                      ),
     *                  ),
     *              ),
     *          ),
     *     ),
     * )
```
